## 💡 Improvement/Refactor Summary

- What was improved or refactored? Reference the issue (e.g., Closes #123).
- What was the motivation or technical debt addressed?
- What is the expected impact (performance, maintainability, etc)?
- Are there any risks or breaking changes?
- What is out of scope or deferred?

## 📊 Metrics & Validation

- Metrics before/after (if relevant):
- How was the change validated?

## 📋 Checklist

- [ ] Improvement/refactor is complete and justified
- [ ] Tests added/updated (if needed)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] No unrelated changes
- [ ] Linked to original improvement/refactor issue

## 📝 Notes for Reviewers

- Any special instructions, risks, or context for reviewers?
